vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Ἐνώς (Heb. אֱנוֹשׁ), ὁ,
Enos (Gen.4:26): Luk.3:38.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time before the Flood, first mentioned at Gen.4.26;
son of: Seth (H8352);
father of: Kenan (H7018); also called Enos at Luk.3.38;
§ Enosh, "[mortal] man"
Enos, (Proper name), indeclinable, Lk. 3:38*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
以挪士 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "不免一死的人"
塞特的兒子 (路 3:38)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
以挪士 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "不免一死的人"
塞特的儿子 (路 3:38)
